Name: Small Town Robot
About the game: Explore the small town of ShadeCreek and unravel the many mysteries hidden within. An Accidental Hero After a Lightning bolt prematurely ends Robo's charging routine, it wakes to find that not all is quite right within the town of ShadeCreek. Use your detective skills to uncover the secrets that the residents are hiding. Detective Abilities Use your brain to use advanced investigation abilities such as: Talking to people Thinking About What they Said Picking Stuff Up you Get the Idea. Multiple Endings Play with the lives of the people living in ShadeCreek by getting the 4 different endings to the game. In this world, robots can't lie (or so they say), so everyone will believe you, for better or worse.
